about_the_game:
"Pathfinder RPG - Pathfinder Flip-Mat - Winter Forest


Winter wonderland!
Whether your party is on the run after escaping an icy prison or hunting mythical creatures that emerge only in winter, no Game Master wants to spend time drawing every snowbank and icicle-laden copse of pines. Fortunately, with Paizo's latest Pathfinder Flip-Mat, you don't have to! This line of gaming maps provides ready-to-use fantasy set pieces for the busy Game Master. Full of beautiful details, including a frozen lake and a snow-draped cave entrance, these maps makes the perfect setting for forays into the bone-chilling cold!

NOTE: This product has been made specifically for the Pathfinder ruleset, but can be used for 5E, Starfinder, or any ruleset supported by Fantasy Grounds
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and Features the Following additions:
  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"
